name: Tetris 1K
description:
Full-featured Tetris in 1024 chars, featuring:

- Sprite Graphics

- Next Piece Preview

- Score System

- Left/Right Piece Rotation

- Pieces can be slotted in under ledges

- Title Screen

- Game Over State/Easy Restart

Controls:

L/R-------Move Piece

O---------Rotate Counterclockwise

X---------Rotate Clockwise

Down---Soft Drop

This is basically a full game of Tetris in 1KB. I had to cut a few niceties like sound effects, level selection, and a fancier title screen, but it's got graphics, solid mechanics, and a full game loop. The scoring system is based on the one in the Game Boy version, but with points only given when lines are cleared, and values divided by 10 to fit in Pico-8's 32,767 maximum. Hope you enjoy playing it!
